Nightstrike:

Nightstrike shot 25 times against CF
  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: LurkerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesda=
y, May 09, 2001 8:43 PM
  Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Ga=
lactor Jets


  ::Cutthroat::
   
      The 4 shots hit Cutthroat, and he f=
ell down butt-first.
    
     "No, I'm madder than you!" Cutthroat "correc=
ted."
   
      Cutthroat ran at Blot, and tried to tackle him down to the =
ground.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2001 7:23 PM
    Sub=
ject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


    The shots b=
anged against Blot's head, knocking him a bit dizzy.

    Blot: GRAAAA! Blo=
t be soooooo madder than you are!

    Blot fired each of his blasters (He =
has 2) twice at Cutthroat...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fro=
m: LurkerAbyss 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, Ma=
y 09, 2001 3:33 PM
      Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Gal=
actor Jets


      ::Cutthroat::
       
      Cutthroat: Now you fight too=
?  Harr, die!
       
      Cutthroat did a 180 degree spin to the side, an=
d the shot missed him.  Then, he took his gun and fired 3 shots at Blot.
  =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 10:30 PM
  =
      Subject: Re: Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


      =
  OOC: 4 shits? Hehehe.

        BIC: Blot: Blot be maaaad! No fightsing!

=
        Blot fires his slime gun at Cutthroat...

          ----- Original =
Message ----- 
          From: LurkerAbyss 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 9:48 PM
          Subject: Re:=
 Two More Decepticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


          ::Cutthroat::
=
           
                Cutthroat, being a copycat, and not wanting to =
lose an advantage, also transformed to robot mode.  He stood still, and the=
 4 shits hit him in the chest.  He looked a little dumbfounded for a moment=
, then whipped out his gun and shot 4 shots back at Hun-Grr.
           
  =
        OOC: Ok, I just said gun 'cause I don't know what weapons Cutthroat=
 has in robot mode.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            F=
rom: Alloran2@... 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            =
Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 9:18 PM
            Subject: Re: Two More Decep=
ticons to Deal With/Galactor Jets


            :::Hun-Grr::: 

           =
 :::Hun-Grr dodges the fireball, transforms to robot mode, and fires 4 shot=
s 
            at Cutthroat::
